'''Mansion Courtyard — Warbling Pavilion''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Mansion Courtyard — Warbling Pavilion is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
